Room.Name: Adlermann Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Adlermann Way, west of the City Guard Barracks.
Room.LongDescription: The impressive structure on the east provides housing for the many hundreds of city guards on patrol in this section of town. The Observational Station to the north and the Northern Entrance to the town all require a large number of guards to patrol the area in addition to the day-to-day patrolling of the city and the City Walls.
